about_the_game:
CHANGE THE BOARD. CHASE THE WORLD.

The short-and-sweet INDIEPOCALYPSE original from developer circle SKY HOUR WORKS finally releases standalone on Steam as HAOxSORA =THE SKY'S ABOUND= RIDE TO OUR FINAL, an upgraded release of our first action title in the PROJECT NATURA series. Rush into an upgraded adventure with revamped story content, new system changes, and updated polish to bring the definitive ENDLESS RUNNER X GEAR-BASED ROGUELITE action out there.

CHANGE THE BOARD - Equip a garage of hoverboards to store between runs and apply to different situations. CHASE THE WORLD - Risk it all and choose when to end your run - either preserving your boards or bailing for a hell of a finish.

FEATURES

- ENDLESS RUNNER X GEAR-BASED RPG: Stat up your boards and store them between runs - the boards you bail with are gone forever, though!

- Teach 'em new tricks: New abilities will join you, alongside a more fleshed-out map progression, letting you choose your path along the ride!

- Take breaks in-between stages by tinkering your boards and learning more about the story of the hero out of time, now revamped with a proper ending and progress trackers.

- Steam Achievements, Leaderboards, and Cloud Support are included!

- Featuring an Original Soundtrack by Rukyyy (SPACE / MECH / PILOT and A NIGHTMARE'S TRIP)
detailed_description:
GET THE /ANNIVERSARY MIX/

Celebrate 5 years of SKY HOUR WORKS with the special deluxe edition bonus pack for HAOxSORA =THE SKY'S ABOUND= RIDE TO OUR FINAL, the /ANNIVERSARY MIX/ which includes the following:

- Digital Art & Design Book for HAOxSORA

- The original version of the game, released for INDIEPOCALYPSE #45

- Bonus Images / Wallpapers for the SKY HOUR WORKS 5th Anniversary Guestbook

- Soundtrack Sampler containing the Best Hits of SKY HOUR WORKS music composed by Ruky

- SKY HOUR WORKS 5th Anniversary Guestbook Digital Zine - featuring anniversary comments from past SHW staff

- Original scriptment for HAOxSORA =THE SKY'S ABOUND= - contains the original 4k words-long script for the game
